New Records: Aaron Judge hit his first postseason home run in the ALCS, marking a significant milestone for the Yankees.
Key Match Events: Aaron Judge's two-run home run in the sixth inning was the turning point of the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Aaron Boone highlighted the importance of the 2-0 series lead and praised the team's resilience.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series shifted to Cleveland, with the Yankees aiming for their first World Series appearance since 2009.
Others: The Yankees' bullpen performed exceptionally well, contributing to the team's victory.
